about_the_game:
Hello everyone, we are happy to announce Anarchy: Supporter pack. This is a bundle of extra goodies for the people who want to go another extra mile to support Anarchy Wolf's Law developers.

The Anarchy: Supporter Pack includes the following digital items:
* x4 start box slots volume
* + Starting equipment
Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for all your support as we develop the best economical action shooter survival experience for you AWL Team
detailed_description:
Hello everyone, we are happy to announce Anarchy: Supporter pack. This is a bundle of extra goodies for the people who want to go another extra mile to support Anarchy Wolf's Law developers.

The Anarchy: Supporter Pack includes the following digital items:
* x4 start box slots volume
* + Starting equipment
Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for all your support as we develop the best economical action shooter survival experience for you AWL Team
name: Anarchy: Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970 GTX or AMD Radeon 570 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
